briefTitle: Effect of Probiotic Supplementation on the Immune System in Patients With Ulcerative Colitis in Amman, Jordan

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Male and female patients,
* Age between 35 -65 years,
* Diagnosed with UC established by colonoscopy and histology, and suffering from mild to moderate UC as defined by Modified Mayo Disease Activity Index (MMDAI) (score 3-9).

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with age \<35 years, \>65 years,
* Pregnancy, planned pregnancy, breastfeeding women,
* Evidence of severe disease (MMDAI \>10),
* Concurrent enteric infection,
* Use of antibiotics,
* Change in the dose of oral 5-aminosalicylic acid (5-ASA) within the past 4weeks, and use of rectal 5-ASA or steroids within 7 days before entry into the study,
* Received any investigational medicines within 3months,
* If they have significant hepatic, renal, endocrine, respiratory, neurological, or cardiovascular diseases

outcomeMeasures.title: The Level of Immunoglobulin (Ig) A
outcomeMeasures.description: The level of Immunoglobulin (Ig) A in mg/dL was tested at the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) based on an Immunoturbidimetric assay using Cobas-C501

outcomeMeasures.title: The Level of Immunoglobulin (Ig) G
outcomeMeasures.description: The level of Immunoglobulin (Ig) G in mg/dL was tested at the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) based on an Immunoturbidimetric assay using Cobas-C501

outcomeMeasures.title: The Level of Immunoglobulin (Ig) M
outcomeMeasures.description: The level of Immunoglobulin (Ig) M in mg/dL was tested at the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) based on an Immunoturbidimetric assay using Cobas-C501

outcomeMeasures.title: The Level of Interleukin (IL)-6
outcomeMeasures.description: The Level of Interleukin (IL)-6 in pg/ml measured aat the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) by a two-site sandwich Enzyme-Linked Immunosorbent Assay (ELISA)

outcomeMeasures.title: The Level of Interleukin (IL)-1
outcomeMeasures.description: The Level of Interleukin (IL)-1 in pg/ml measured at the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) by a two-site sandwich Enzyme-Linked Immunosorbent Assay (ELISA)

outcomeMeasures.title: The Level of Interleukin (IL)-10
outcomeMeasures.description: The Level of Interleukin (IL)-10 in pg/ml was measured at the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) by a two-site sandwich Enzyme-Linked Immunosorbent Assay (ELISA)

outcomeMeasures.title: The Level of Tumor Necrosis Factor (TNF)-α
outcomeMeasures.description: The Level of TNF-α in pg/ml measured at the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) by a two-site sandwich Enzyme-Linked Immunosorbent Assay (ELISA)

outcomeMeasures.title: The Level of C-reactive Protein (CRP)
outcomeMeasures.description: The Level of CRP in mg/ml measured at the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) based on an Immunoturbidimetric assay using Cobas-C501

outcomeMeasures.title: Quality of Life of Patients
outcomeMeasures.description: The average score of the general quality of life (QoL) subscales was assessed by the Short Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire (SIBDQ). The SIBDQ contains 10 questions for 4 functional scales (Bowel, Systemic, emotional, and social). For each question, there a regraded responses on a 7-point Likert scale ranging from one (representing the ''worst'' aspect) to seven (representing the ''best'' aspect). Total SIBDQ scores range from 10 to 70.Higher scores reflect better well-being.

outcomeMeasures.title: The Level of White Blood Cell Count (WBC)
outcomeMeasures.description: The level of WBC as cells\*10\^9/l measured at the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) using the automated analyzer Sysmex XS-500i

outcomeMeasures.title: The Level of Red Blood Cell Count (RBC)
outcomeMeasures.description: The level of RBC as cells\*10\^12/l measured at the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) using the automated analyzer Sysmex XS-500i

outcomeMeasures.title: The Mean Corpuscular Volume (MCV)
outcomeMeasures.description: The MCV in fl measured at the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) using the automated analyzer Sysmex XS-500i

outcomeMeasures.title: The Mean Corpuscular Hemoglobin (MCH)
outcomeMeasures.description: The MCH in pg measured at the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) using the automated analyzer Sysmex XS-500i

outcomeMeasures.title: The Mean Corpuscular Hemoglobin Concentration (MCHC)
outcomeMeasures.description: The MCH in g/dl measured at the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) using the automated analyzer Sysmex XS-500i

outcomeMeasures.title: The Platelet Count
outcomeMeasures.description: The Platelet count as cells 10\^9/ll measured at the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) using the automated analyzer Sysmex XS-500i

outcomeMeasures.title: The of Hemoglobin
outcomeMeasures.description: The Hemoglobin in g/dl measured at the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) using the automated analyzer Sysmex XS-500i

outcomeMeasures.title: The Mean Platelet Volume (MPV)
outcomeMeasures.description: The MPV in fl measured at the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) using the automated analyzer Sysmex XS-500i

outcomeMeasures.title: The Level of Lymphocytes
outcomeMeasures.description: The number of lymphocytes cells as cells\*10\^9/L measuredat the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) using the automated analyzer Sysmex XS-500i

outcomeMeasures.title: The Level of Monocytes
outcomeMeasures.description: The number of Monocytes cells measured at the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) using the automated analyzer Sysmex XS-500i

outcomeMeasures.title: The Level of Eosinophils
outcomeMeasures.description: The number of eosinophils cells measured at the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) using the automated analyzer Sysmex XS-500i

outcomeMeasures.title: The Level of Basophils
outcomeMeasures.description: The number of basophils cells measured at the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) using the automated analyzer Sysmex XS-500i

outcomeMeasures.title: The Level of Neutrophils
outcomeMeasures.description: The number of neutrophils cells measured at the end of follow-up (after 6 weeks of follow-up) using the automated analyzer Sysmex XS-500i
